com.atc.simulator.vectors

Interface Spheroid

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Sphere

    public interface Spheroid
    A spheroid representation of the planet.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double arcDistance(SphericalCoordinate pos1, SphericalCoordinate pos2)
      Get the arc distance (shortest distance) along the spheroid surface from one point to another.
      double getAverageRadius()
      Get the average radius of the spheroid.
      double getRadius(SphericalCoordinate pos)
      Get the radius of the spheroid at the given position.

    • Method Detail

      • getAverageRadius

        double getAverageRadius()
        Get the average radius of the spheroid.
        Returns:

      • arcDistance

        double arcDistance(SphericalCoordinate pos1,
                   SphericalCoordinate pos2)
        Get the arc distance (shortest distance) along the spheroid surface from one point to another. It can also be thought of as the distance along the line of intersection of the plane and the spheroid, where the plane is defined by the cross product of the cartesian coordinates of this point and the other point.
        Parameters:
        pos1 - from this point
        pos2 - to this point
        Returns:
